JETTQ.LED
Class ILED

java.lang.Object
  JETTQ.LED.ILED
Direct Known Subclasses:
TriColorLEDAdapter
public abstract class ILED
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class for using the LEDs on the SPOT. Implements only the setIntensity method.

Author:
JETTQ [jettq@wpi.edu]

isOn

public abstract boolean isOn()
Function determines whether or not the LED is ON

Returns:
True if on, False otherwise

turnOn

public abstract void turnOn()
Function turns ON the LED

turnOff

public abstract void turnOff()
Function turns OFF the LED

supportsRGBColors

public abstract boolean supportsRGBColors()
Function determines if an LED supports RGB Color codes

Returns:
True if LED supports RGB color codes, false otherwise

setRGBColor

public abstract void setRGBColor(int r,
                                 int g,
                                 int b)
Function sets the Color displayed by the LED

Parameters:
r - Int representing the RED color value (0-255)
g - Int representing the GREEN color value (0-255)
b - Int representing the BLUE color value (0-255)

setColor

public abstract void setColor(com.sun.spot.sensorboard.peripheral.LEDColor ledcolor)
Function set the Color as specified in the given LEDColor object

Parameters:
ledcolor - The LEDColor object containing the color to display

getColor

public abstract com.sun.spot.sensorboard.peripheral.LEDColor getColor()
Function gets the current Color as a LEDColor object

Returns:
the LEDColor of the LED

getIntensity

public abstract int getIntensity()
Function retrieves the current display Intensity

Returns:
int representing how bright the LED is.

public void setIntensity(int intensity)
Function sets the current display Intensity

intensity - The new Intensity
